name: Promptify
description: Promptify is a web-based application designed to assist users in generating creative prompts for various purposes. Whether you're a writer looking for inspiration, a student working on a project, or someone in need of ideas for brainstorming, Promptify can help spark your creativity.

name: Weebopedia (Under Development)
description: Weebopedia, the ultimate anime hub! Discover in-depth details about your favorite shows, characters, and genres. Engage with a vibrant community, share recommendations, and connect with fellow anime enthusiasts. Your gateway to the dynamic world of Japanese animation awaits at Weebopedia!
